meanings.definition: The quality of being nippy or chilly.
meanings.sent1: I felt the nippiness in the air as I walked outside.
meanings.sent2: The nippiness of the ice cream made me shiver.
meanings.sent3: The nippiness of the breeze made me wrap my scarf tighter.
meanings.sent4: The nippiness of the morning air woke me up instantly.
meanings.sent5: The nippiness of the water was refreshing on a hot day.

meanings.definition: The state of being quick or agile.
meanings.sent1: Her nippiness on the soccer field impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The cat's nippiness allowed it to catch the mouse effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's nippiness as it climbed the tree was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The cheetah's nippiness was unmatched in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's nippiness on stage captivated the audience.
